name: Deluxe Perfume Sampler Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Discover fragrance at Sephora with this set that includes fragrances and bonus beauty from SEPHORA COLLECTION..This Set Contains:- 0.16 oz/ 5 mL BURBERRY Her Elixir
ingredients: Burberry:.ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, AQUA/WATER/EAU, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, LIMONENE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL...NEST New York:.FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, TRIETHYL CITRATE, ETHYL HEXYL GLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, BAOBAB OIL (ADANSONIA DIGITATA SEED OIL), ANISYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, CITRAL, COUMARIN...Versace:.ALCOHOL, DENAT. (SD ALCOHOL 39-C), FRAGRANCE, WATER, BUTYLPHENYL, METHYLPROPIONAL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, HYDROXYSOHEXYL 3-CYCLOHEXENE CARBOXALDEHYDE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL, METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, CI 17200 (RED 33), CI 15985 (YELLOW 6)...Sephora Collection Lip Stain:.SODODECANE, DIMETHICONE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, POLYBUTENE, MICA, PETROLATUM, CYCLOHEXASILOXANE, KAOLIN, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, CERA ALBA (BEESWAX), SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, AROMA (FLAVOR), GLYCERYL BEHENATE/EICOSADIOATE, TOCOPHEROL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, BENZYL ALCOHOL. (+/-) : CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), CI 77491/CI 77492/CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), CI 15850 (RED 6/ RED 7 LAKE), CI 45380 (RED 21 LAKE/ RED 22 LAKE), CI 45410 (RED 28 LAKE), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5 LAKE), CI 42090 (BLUE 1 LAKE), CI 75470 (CARMINE)...Sephora Collection Primer:.DIMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, ISODODECANE, CAPRYLYL METHICONE, SILICA, POLYPHENYLSILSESQUIOXANE, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, MICA, CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE), TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CI 77492 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77491 (IRON OXIDES), CI 77499 (IRON OXIDES), GINKGO BILOBA LEAF EXTRACT...Sephora Collection Mask:.AQUA (WATER), BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, POLYGLYCERYL-10 LAURATE, 1,2-.HEXANEDIOL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, LECITHIN, CITRULLUS LANATUS (WATERMELON) FRUIT EXTRACT, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, HYDROGENATED ETHYLHEXYL OLIVATE, GLYCOLIPIDS, SORBITAN CAPRYLATE, SUCCINOGLYCAN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, XANTHAN GUM, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, HYDROGENATED OLIVE OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, MANGIFERA INDICA (MANGO) FRUIT EXTRACT, PYRIDOXINE HCL, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, GARDENIA TAHITENSIS FLOWER, TOCOPHEROL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly don't love this set but I don't think it's too bad for the price. I was able to try the perfumes before buying the bigger bottles. The only thing I didn't like here is the lip stain as I thought it had a weird smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There's another perfume sampler set with more perfumes for $38 - go buy that one. The lip stain shade made my lips look pale and bloodless, and the primer is meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfumes are expensive and especially not having a sephora in my city it's great to smell them before going all in. They also have a lot in them too and have lasted me quite a while, I have to say that the burberry is my favourite, however i haven't tried the actual sephora stuff yet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy all the mini products in this set and think they're perfect for somebody wanting little testers:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product highly recommended u2764ufe0f I gifted to my cousin she like it the most

reviews.review_title: I'm in love with this set.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this set is absolutely amazing. the on sale price of $34 CAD is so worth it. the lip stain alone is at least $20, and the perfume samples are amazing. I'm so glad I bought this. they are the perfect sample size and have me thinking about buying the full size of some of them. I also love the case it came in, I'm going to use it for my acne patches!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pls do not waste your money in buying this.. first of all the perfumes are so super small that it's small even for a kid!.. only thing good is the packaging and Sephora stick these are only real products rest all look like doll house products!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looooveee the little perfume samples. They smell so good. I got this for my birthday and I'm so happy. But the price should be at 35$ or something. I also really like the lip stain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice to be able to try expensive perfumes before buying larger size. The fragrances are awesome. The mat lip stain lasts and and does not transfer.
NOTTT WORTH ITTT they're so tiny omg BUT two stars cuz I LOVED the scents lasted a good few hours on my skin alone. And that mask was like God sent so so nice  lipstick was HORRIBLE, primer was meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like as much. Sizes are too small for the price. Lipstick shade is awful for brown skin

Love the cute purple case, very sturdy and see-through top. Perfect for travelling. I love the lip stick, color stays on and lovely bold color. Perfumes are cute for travelling on the go, really small - can fit into your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These look like toys, but I wanted some samples of these perfumes. they should called it mini mini sampler. It should be priced at $25 or $30 lol it's cute though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In comparison to previous sets this is a horrible deal. As a perfume set it should contain (and call me crazy) more perfume. I'd just get the sampler from SDM since you can get a full size one at the end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's cute honestly.   I really wanted to sample the fragrances mostly so the set made it easier rather than buying individually

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I collect minis so I bought this set during the sale. Not sure why everyone is complaining because a 10ml travel spray is an average of $40 alone, and you get 13ml of fragrance in this set. you also get a face mask, a full size gloss and a deluxe sample of a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: why sephora collection??? 49$ ??!!! the sizes are so tiny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With a name like deluxe sampler and a price tag of $50, you'd think there would be all perfume items. Wrong, it's half perfume and half Sephora collection, not even other items. We just want perfume with the ticket to redeem.
